snippet.title: Death of Marionette | Full Game Playthrough - The Mannequin Factory (No Commentary Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Sawyer and her friends arrive at a ruined factory to prepare an event. While everyone’s busy, Sawyer experiences something strange inside the building. Sometime later, Huck Finn, Sawyer’s boyfriend, arrives at the factory with some friends after receiving a text message from her... Walkthrough of Death of Marionette | Only pure, blind and uncut Gameplay of the full game playthrough!
Wishlist or buy it on Steam if you like and wanna support the game!

0:00 Prologue
20:04 Act 1
56:49 Act 2
1:50:46 Act 3
2:35:36 Credits
2:37:15 Ending Scene

Steampage: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2618380/Death_of_Marionette/
More adventure games playthroughs: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOnMCfF4bES42KiJidrlEplQRuCeCXv9z
More puzzle games playthroughs: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOnMCfF4bES50W7OgFAPOux1y3p56sORm
More full game playthroughs: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOnMCfF4bES7Nng_tq7qqakaZcTi603rl

Game: Death of Marionette
Developer/Publisher: Gustav
Genre: Adventure
Sub-Genre: RPG-Maker, Mystery, Drama, Puzzle, Pixel
Release-Date: 20 january 2024

Description from the Steampage: "Sawyer and her friends arrive at a ruined factory to prepare an event. While everyone’s busy, Sawyer experiences something strange inside the building.
Sometime later, Huck Finn, Sawyer’s boyfriend, arrives at the factory with some friends after receiving a text message from her...
    An RPG Maker style adventure game with real time combat - clear your path with your trusty Steel Pipe. Enhance yourself and your weapons with items found on your adventure.
    Beautiful illustrations and pixel sprites - Enjoy tens of pictures made by the main artists LuB2an and Coinman.
    Moody piano music - 22 soundtrack pieces written by the artist Antler and the developer Gustav"

Twitter (X): https://twitter.com/AbsPureGameplay
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/abspuregameplay.bsky.social
My Steam Curator Section: https://store.steampowered.com/curator/44722414-Ab%2527s-Pure-Gameplay/
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@abs.pure.gameplay

Shiny indiegame gems, full game playthroughs, demo-tests, first looks of new releases or any videogame related stuff, thats whats you gonna find here, everything with no commentary - without any loss of full gameplay action, so you can enjoy pure, uncut and mostly blind footage!
Also, i will always try to record as much content of a demo, a steam playtest or even a first look of a game, just because to show the potencial of a game. This is not a "i record every single game for 10 minutes"-channel - i just love testing games for so many years now, privately and for my work, that's why i decided to share at least a glimpse of my gameplay on this channel. :)
If you have any questions, a wish what i should play next or just feedback, lemme know in the comments!


PC Gameplay of the indiegame Death of Marionette - English Playthrough by Abs Pure Gameplay Videos / Ab's Pure Gameplay Videos
